hero.title: Meet Our
hero.subtitle: Our team of qualified, registered nurses brings decades of clinical experience to provide you with expert care, guidance, and rapid response 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.

whyDifferent.title: Why Our Nursing Team is Different

qualified.title: Registered & Qualified
qualified.description: Every member of our nursing team is a fully qualified Registered General Nurse (RGN) with current NMC registration and ongoing professional development.

specialist.title: Specialist Training
specialist.description: Our nurses are trained in elderly care, remote monitoring, emergency response, and using AI health insights to provide proactive, preventive care.

available.title: Always Available
available.description: Our nursing team operates 24/7/365 with dedicated day and night shifts. You're never alone - expert help is always just a button press away.

personCentered.title: Person-Centered Care
personCentered.description: We get to know you, your preferences, and your health history. Our nurses provide personalized guidance tailored to your unique needs.

team.title: Meet Some of Our Senior Nurses
team.subtitle: Our clinical leadership team brings together decades of nursing experience across emergency care, geriatrics, chronic disease management, and digital health.
team.footer: Plus 40+ additional registered nurses providing 24/7 coverage across our care network

nurses.name: Sarah Thompson
nurses.title: Lead Clinical Nurse
nurses.bio: Sarah leads our clinical team with extensive experience in emergency medicine and elderly care. She ensures our response protocols meet the highest clinical standards.

nurses.name: James Mitchell
nurses.title: Senior Nurse Specialist
nurses.bio: James specializes in chronic disease management and brings deep expertise in supporting patients with complex health needs at home.

nurses.name: Maria Garcia
nurses.title: Clinical Nurse Manager
nurses.bio: Maria oversees quality assurance and staff training, ensuring compassionate, person-centered care for all our members and their families.

nurses.name: David Chen
nurses.title: Technology Integration Nurse
nurses.bio: David bridges healthcare and technology, ensuring our AI systems and devices deliver accurate, clinically relevant insights.

nurses.name: Emma Williams
nurses.title: Night Shift Coordinator
nurses.bio: Emma leads our 24/7 night team, providing expert care and rapid response when it matters most.

nurses.name: Aisha Patel
nurses.title: Community Nurse Liaison
nurses.bio: Aisha coordinates with GPs, families, and social services to ensure seamless, integrated care for our members.

steps.title: AI-Assisted Monitoring
steps.description: Our nurses are alerted by AI when your device data shows concerning patterns - they review, assess, and reach out proactively before small issues become emergencies.

steps.title: Emergency Response
steps.description: When you press your SOS button, a nurse answers within seconds, assesses your situation, provides guidance, and dispatches help if needed - all while staying on the line with you.

steps.title: Health Guidance
steps.description: Call anytime for health questions, medication queries, or advice. Our nurses provide evidence-based guidance and coordinate with your GP when needed.

steps.title: Family Communication
steps.description: With your permission, our nurses keep family members informed, provide updates after incidents, and coordinate care plans with your loved ones.
